title: Wanda Realm Fuyang celebrates Grand Opening
text:
Wanda Realm Fuyang celebrates Grand Opening   31, 2015 eTN   
Wanda Hotels & Resorts announced the grand opening of Wanda Realm Fuyang in the city’s newly built and modern business district in China’s Anhui province. It is the 78th hotel of Wanda Hotels & Resorts, the 42nd owned and managed hotel and the 30th Wanda Realm branded hotel. 
“Fuyang city boasts the largest population and is the fourth biggest city in Anhui province. Rapidly developing, Fuyang ranked second only to Hefei in economic and retail related sectors. The city has tremendous development potential. With the strong demand for internationally branded hotels, Wanda Realm Fuyang will certainly be the benchmark for the hospitality industry in Fuyang city,” said Mr. André Liu, General Manager of Wanda Realm Fuyang. 
Wanda Realm Fuyang is conveniently located in Fuyang's central business district and adjacent to Wanda Plaza, the shopping and entertainment complex. Enjoying convenient access to public transportation, the hotel is only 8-km from Fuyang Xiguan Airport, 8-km from the railway station and only 1-km from Fuyang’s long-distance bus station. 
Wanda Realm Fuyang offers 286 exquisitely appointed rooms and suites starting from 40sqm to the 300sqm Presidential Suite. To ensure the perfect comfort for guests, every room features an ultra-comfortable "Bed of Realm” and "Dream Catcher” Guests will also experience Oriental elements through the Book of “Liki” which is available in every room. The decorations of the hotel originated from traditional Chinese rose elements, which feature a fusion of classical and modern styles. 
The hotel is well-designed with unique food and beverage outlets. ZHEN Chinese restaurant serves the finest Cantonese dishes with a selection of local flavors as well as original creations. Café Realm All-day Dining restaurant serves a-la-carte dishes and features a lavish buffet that adopts a modern approach to Asian and western favorites. The Chili & Pepper specialty restaurant takes you on a journey of celebrated 
Sichuan and Hunan cuisines, offering traditional dishes using only the finest ingredients. The Lobby Lounge is a welcoming place to meet with friends or colleagues to enjoy tea, coffee, or a refreshing cocktail in a serene and relaxing ambience. The hotel’s signature CHA Journey presented by the Realm Angel in the hotel lobby will take guests on an exploration of traditional Chinese courtesy and hospitality. 
The hotel’s magnificent 1,200sqm pillar-free Grand Ballroom can be separated into three individual rooms with a ceiling height of 10 meters and a huge 80sqm LED screen. Another four function rooms are all equipped with advanced audio-visual facilities. Our professional meeting planners can tailor-make events of all sizes and tend to every detail so as to guarantee the success of any meeting or event. 
The hotel's Health Club features a well-equipped gymnasium and rejuvenating treatments. The Yoga room, steam room, heated indoor swimming pool and Jacuzzi offer relaxing and invigorating combinations to both unwind and recharge.
